text:
Wilmington NC, US | On-site | Full-Time

.NET / C# Developer

Bonus points for: * WPF/XAML * Messaging Systems * ASP.NET * Experience Delivering Software

Kraybill and Associates, small (8) tight knit firm specializing in applications for the Nuclear industry. We get to work on some cool stuff, but it's kinda hard to advertise.

Tech-Stack is mostly Microsoft, source control is TFS backed by git.

http://jobview.monster.com/GetJob.aspx?JobID=163900931&aid=3...
